metadata.title: CVE-2024-41025 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:misc: fastrpc: Fix memory leak in audio daemon attach operationAudio PD daemon send the name as part of the init IOCTL call. Thisname needs to be copied to kernel for which memory is allocated.This memory is never freed which might result in memory leak. Freethe memory when it is not needed.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
